person.persName: Richard Oldham (Madison County, KY, farmer and soldier)

body.p: Madison County, Kentucky, farmer and soldier. Madison County native. Married to Minerva N. Ross Oldham on November 9, 1865. Resident in Madison County in 1850. Farmer in Madison County in 1860. Household owned nine enslaved persons in Madison County in 1860. Served in the 11th Kentucky Volunteer Cavalry Regiment (C.S.A.) as private and assistant wagon maker from September 10, 1862, to July 19, 1863. Prisoner of war at Camp Morton, Indiana, from July 23, 1863, to August 17, 1863. Prisoner of war at Camp Douglas, Illinois, from August 17, 1863, to February 6, 1865.
